solution_line_template: The first crane is {percent1} percent taller because if {building1_height} + {building1_height}x = {crane1_height} then x={percent1}/100
The second crane is {percent2} percent taller because if {building2_height} + {building2_height}x = {crane2_height} then x = {percent2}/100
The third crane is {percent3} percent taller because if {building3_height} + {building3_height}x = {crane3_height} then x = {percent3}/100

The average percent greater the height of the crane is than the building is {average_percent} because {total_percent} / {num_cranes} = <<{total_percent}/{num_cranes}={average_percent}>>{average_percent}
